name: Civilization Explorer
description:
In Civilization Explorer, you need to defeat the civilization species that attacks you while you are exploring their planet. Pretty simple game nothing fancy.

Warning, a lot of flashing and color changing. Might not be suitable for some people. If you don't know are you in danger, I suggest playing the game below instead. Don't say I haven't warned you.
